ygData.subject: RE: Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion (sp)
ygData.msgSnippet: Its probably the best piece of equipment my bard has.  It has saved my life innumerable times.  It has one charge of 80 pt Healing.  That almost 25% additional
ygData.messageBody:
Its probably the best piece of equipment my bard has. It has saved my life
innumerable times. It has one charge of 80 pt Healing. That almost 25%
additional hp's at least until 17th level. It is rechargeable as you have
seen, although I have to sing Carillion to get it recharged as my
Indifferent faction isn't good enough to get Hendi to recharge it. To use
it, it needs to be in an open inventory slot, or on your finger. You target
yourself and rt click it. It cannot be interrupted and has no casting time.
Just like spring crystals etc. You cannot be actively singing a song (song
buttons all grayed out) or it won't work. Its amazing the critters yu can
beat with just a extra 25% or so hp's. I imagine it will become less useful
after 25th level or so, but so far it has saved me and other party members
several times when the cleric has screeched OOM!

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 12:58 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion
(sp)
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

Pardon my ignorance, but what exactly does the Squad Ring do? I'm assuming
it's a good thing for Bards to have?

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

-----Original Message-----
From: Operaman [mailto:slider@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 12:25 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion
(sp)


From: "Operaman" <slider@...>

>
> They changed it when they made the ring no-drop. You no
> longer get a faction hit for getting the ring, nor do you get

Actually, I distinctly remember getting a GuardiansoftheVale faction hit
when I got the ring (It was just yesterday evening, so even my swiss-cheese
memory recalls it).

> a faction increase for recharging it. So unless you do
> something to lower your faction with GuardiansoftheVale, if
> you should accidently give your ring to Hendri before singing
> your song and she won't give it back, you can just go back to
> the marshall and get another ring.


Whether I get it recharged or get a new one is unimportant as long as I
don't have to cause two more species' extinction to do it! : D


Operaman
Meandering Maestro
Innoruuk
